name: Drive LX 570 Dubai Simulator
description:
Drive LX 570 Dubai Simulator
Driving Simulator LX 570 Dubai - If you're a fan of this powerful and reliable utility vehicle 570 you'll love this game!
If you are not a fan, you still get a lot of positive emotions from the LX 570 is driving!
Explore the interesting and beautiful city on the big 4x4 car!
Such a powerful SUV is not stuck in the sand, in the snow or shipping!
Management with a view from the helm, it is very convenient and fun!
Complete all the levels in the game faster than your friends! Unlock the entire fleet of vehicles in the garage! Collect a complete collection of LX cars at the game!
Ride around the city by car and score points!
The faster and further you will pass, the more you will earn on your next dream car!
Collect cans of gasoline, they will help you in the game!
Beat friends highscore!
Feel like a leader in non-road! LX 570 - it is force!
Leave us your feedback and evaluation, help us to make our app even better!
